Credibility_Assessment: Board doubted political activity post-1994 and political motive of 2002 incident
Basis_of_Claim: Political persecution in Sri Lanka following party election loss
Regulation_Cited: IRPA sections related to refugee status
Application_Error: Erroneous credibility assessment based on omissions
Review_Outcome: Case remanded for redetermination by a different Board member
Evidence_Ignored: Potential context for omissions in documentation
Legal_Standard: Well-founded fear of persecution on grounds of race, religion, nationality, political opinion, or membership in a particular social group
Application_Factor: Omissions in police reports and immigration interviews
Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board erred in credibility assessment

Credibility_Issues: Omissions in reporting political incidents and activities

Procedural_Issue: Error in procedural reasoning affecting outcome
